title: Audio Visualizer
instructions: Adjust the bass and treble sliders to modify the effect. Mew and Mewtwo react change the size of their orbs when you do this.
Enable or disable bars, circles, noise, inversion, or emboss effects using the checkboxes.
Click show controls to open DJ station. Here you upload any song you'd like, change the volume and change the audio form.
Other information: I added base and treble to the audio routing graph. The sprite class is for the stars.
I use it to place them on the screen and make them pulse. In the JSON file I have these instructions, the title and the star locations.
